Package com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients

This is the core package for Communication.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Client
    An Client is an Object-Representation of a physical Computer, connected via one or multiple Socket.
    Connection
    A Connection is an object-representation of an physical connection between the ClientStart and the ServerStart.
    ConnectionFactory  
    DeSerializationAdapter<F,T>
    This Adapter will deserialize the F into a T.
    ReceiveOrSendSynchronization
    This interface allows you, to wait for a certain Object to be send or received over the previously requested Connection.
    SerializationAdapter<F,T>
    This Adapter will serialize a F into a T.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnection
    This Abstract Connection makes it easier for you, to create a custom Connection
    ClientID
    This Class is the Identification of any Client.
    DefaultConnection
    This class is the identifier for the Connection, which is established by default.
    JavaDeSerializationAdapter
    This Adapter utilizes the Java-Serialization to deserialize an String into an Object.
    JavaSerializationAdapter
    This SerializationAdapter utilizes the Java-Serialization, to serialize a Object into a String.
    PingDeSerializationAdapter
    This DeSerializationAdapter will deserialize an Ping, serialized with the PingSerializationAdapter.
    PingSerializationAdapter
    This DeSerializationAdapter will deserialize an Ping, serialized with the PingSerializationAdapter
    TCPDefaultConnection
    This ConnectionImplementation attempts to create an TCP Connection.
    UDPDefaultConnection
    UDPDefaultConnection.

Package com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients Description

This is the core package for Communication. It contains Connections, Clients and stuff.
